scripts.release:patch: npm run verify-git-not-dirty && lerna run build && lerna version patch --yes && lerna run build && git add . && git commit -m "Dev version bump" && lerna publish from-package --yes
scripts.release:patch:dev: lerna run build && lerna version patch --no-git-tag-version --yes && lerna run build && lerna publish from-package --dist-tag dev --yes
scripts.release:prerelease:dev: lerna run build && lerna version prerelease --no-git-tag-version --yes && lerna run build && lerna publish from-package --dist-tag dev --yes
